The Shifengshan Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Shanxi Province, specifically in Huairen County

owners: Shanxi Huairen Zhifengshan Coal Industry Company
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shanghai Qianchang Investment Company and owned by Shanxi Huairen Zhifengshan Coal Industry Company.
